title: Insects: a world of diversity (MAC)
brief_description: SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Apple Macintosh computer, 13 inch colour monitor (or larger), 4MB RAM, CD-ROM drive. Spectacular insect fauna comes to life in a unique exploration of biological diversity. This is a multimedia experience that will inform and inspire an exploration of the insect world. It has been designed to be of value to everybody interested in nature, from primary school age and up. Includes colour photographs of live insects, recordings of sound producing insects, digital video documentaries and information on identifying, catching and keeping insects.
